## Block.getInheritedDisabled() method

Get whether the block is disabled or not due to parents. The block's own disabled property is not considered.  True if disabled.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getInheritedDisabled(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
